Honouring Dr. Saul Isserow

Honouring Dr. Saul Isserow

Honouring Dr. Saul Isserow

A Journey from South Africa to Canada

VGH & UBC Hospital Foundation is pleased to partner with the Canadian Friends of Hebrew University to honour Dr. Saul Isserow, reputable cardiologist at Vancouver General Hospital (VGH). Together, we are also fundraising to support the Inspired by Einstein Student Scholarship at the Hebrew University and the Sports Cardiology Program at VGH.

Join us for an informal and fun-filled summer event in celebration of Dr. Isserow.

Event details:

Date: Thursday, June 28, 2018
Time: 6:30pm
Location: Landmark Aviation Hanger, YVR South Terminal
Dress code: Smart casual

Learn more
Purchase tickets

BENEFITING:



Office Hours

8:30am – 4:30pm (PST) Mon to Fri
Phone: 604 875 4676
Toll Free: 1 877 875 4676
